Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Player

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Player
public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
This class is the model representation of the physical player. It keep all the information regarding the single player. It provides methods to perform actions on the game.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private God god
    The player's god, can't be the same as other players
    private java.lang.String nickname
    The name chosen by the physical player
    private Worker[] ownWorkers
    A structure to contain all the player's workers
    private TurnEventsManager turnEventsManager
    A manager of the player's in game spells and buffs, must be passed to the turn in the binding process
    private static int WORKER_NUMBER
    The player's workers number, constant and common to all players

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Player​(java.lang.String nickname)
    Constructor of the class, initializes nickname and workers, leaves god and turn event manager to be defined

      public Worker getWorkerByID​(WorkerID id)
      Retrieves the player's worker by its ID
      Parameters:

      Returns:

    • getGod

      public God getGod()
      Getter of the player's god
      Returns:
      the god bound to the player

    • setGod

      public void setGod​(God god)
      This method sets up the player's god. It saves the god card and initializes the TurnEventManager
      Parameters:
      god - the god chosen by the player
